explains: adj. 神经的，神经系统的
wordGroup: fuzzy neural network 模糊神经网络

sentences.en: Neural networks are computer systems which mimic the workings of the brain.
sentences.cn: 神经网络是模仿大脑运行的计算机系统。

sentences.en: Their research thus implies a different character model, which is supposed to manipulate the neural networks inside.
sentences.cn: 因此，他们的研究暗示了一种不同的特征模型，该模型被认为是用来操纵内部神经网络的。

sentences.en: This metabolic cost may arise from the muscular and neural activity involved in singing or from behaviors associated with singing.
sentences.cn: 这种代谢消耗可能是由于唱歌或与唱歌相关的行为中涉及的肌肉和神经活动所产生的。
